product_name: Pearl Izumi Elite Barrier Shoe Covers
long_description: Pearl Izumi Elite Barrier bike shoe covers keep your feet warm when you're riding in nasty weather. Shoe covers feature 3mm of durable, insulating neoprene to keep feet warm and dry; soft microfleece lining. Durable Kevlar(R) soles that spread open and rear rip-and-stick closure offer easy on and off. Tall cuffs cover skin between shoe tops and tights. Anatomic paneling offers a performance fit; reflective detailing increases visibility in low light. Pearl Izumi recommends Elite Barrier bike shoe covers for road shoes with external cleats.
short_description: Pearl Izumi Elite Barrier bike shoe covers keep your feet warm when you're riding in nasty weather.
